duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the technical design, planning, and implementation of mission-critical enterprise systems
Serve as a technical expert in system administration for complex operating systems
Provide recommendations on operating systems and system applications
Investigate system feasibility, document system specifications, and identify methods to drive efficiency
Perform problem management, root cause analysis, and provide support services for cloud and SaaS products
Maintain direct contact with vendors to expedite service restoration

education_certification.credential: B.A./B.S. in related field or equivalent work experience
MCSA, MCSE, or MCITP certifications (Windows 2008 or higher)
